amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the requirement that not less than $750,000,000 of Global Health Programs shall be made available for family planning/reproductive health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to strike the requirement that not less than $750,000,000 of Global Health Programs shall be made available for family planning/reproductive health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 225 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 225 (Roll no. 324).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A075) offered by Mrs. Lesko.
